display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZW8Hr351PagQ7kNvwHDk8hZ&_nc_oc=AdnnbnoRi7iNZBykhoPmsBpQDPTDmC3CYbvzhsXnT5ESEURV118vA3R4FsJdA46NAPw&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfoqpmPNyY71oY5s3_uzlW5XEyPyoKV379viPbcovJADtQ&oe=6980C46A)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=6YSj4f4s1ZsQ7kNvwHxq0oC&_nc_oc=AdlVaxKd1JRTf_yOBK1bhTEno-0CLOoTpf3vLYfnyK8OQ_9UNP5lVG8wU8a08Arb2RY&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_Afq7dGnLdQScw7xYbDz0F-SCOMXB9P74WwQH8j4te8jISQ&oe=6980ED12)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=eeeGJhoQppoQ7kNvwFQ7Fhh&_nc_oc=AdljTo75clDh7qpoRGy7lnFt4Z2_XTFB_T8mU_IZFchtZ_1Y2W4bnbBcfJpFXoZK7Cg&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfqjzHvznM-rg65iHH52fse_HsB4OCGGCACLPyD1T0oEqQ&oe=6980BBAD)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iU9HVag87iUQ7kNvwHLu1WY&_nc_oc=AdkGvEG52DuF6TX6O8muo2lWYmSOeQf8bmDtOwQlK1hZWmhCwrnODCUmHp3Va-8YLr0&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfqC1zfmst97DMxovGQt1GtEIH_axn2G6N7s1OKTLhpIIg&oe=6980D010)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
